original_text: If he came to you alone, he is free to leave alone. If he came with a wife, she can also leave with him.
korean_text: 만일 그가 단신으로 왔으면 단신으로 나갈 것이요 장가 들었으면 그의 아내도 그와 함께 나가려니와

sentences.original_text: If he came to you alone
he is free to leave alone
If he came with a wife
she can also leave with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀 역시 그와 함께 떠날 수 있다
